data.text: @Aaron_Derfel Here in car dealer's for service on my car, receptionist just told someone "Back to normal" with a big grin.  Wait a month, Sweetheart.

@Aaron_Derfel Don’t forget to mention that vaccination rates among Hong Komg’s elderly (70+/80+) are extremely low …
@Aaron_Derfel Yeah, but that's what they said about the original flavor of Omicron and it's cut a swath through Quebec. So maybe not so bad for some, deadly for others. ☹️

@Aaron_Derfel @RadCentrism Everybody, everywhere will eventually be exposed to coronavirus. "Zero COVID" is a fantasy. Vaccination works to reduce deaths; nothing else has a significant impact, including masks, quarantines, social distancing, travel bans, etc. Get the vax and move on with your life...

@LussiD @Aaron_Derfel No, it can't. But I wonder if you can see that your comment might seem disrespectul towards the people of Hong Kong who worked tirelessly to use science and apply measures that worked. They saved countless lives in the process and prevented numerous long term sequelae.
@Aaron_Derfel Sky high infections but 50 deaths; it's Omicron, a mild disease, finally getting into Hong Kong.  Will follow same trajectory as other countries UK, US, SA.
